content: Skyworks revenue for the fourth fiscal quarter of 2022 was $1.407 billion, up 7% year-over-year and up 14% sequentially, driven by both mobile and broad markets. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. I know there'll be a lot of questions around inventory corrections and whatnot in the smartphone market, in China and with your largest customer, but I wanted to focus on the broad markets business, because it's a bit more diverse.
